detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- SparkFinance.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#67-69)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#38)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#39)
	- SparkFinance.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#71-73)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#40)
	- SparkFinance.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#75-77)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#41)
	- SparkFinance.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#85-100)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#42)
	- SparkFinance.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/SparkFinance.sol#102-106)
